title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP - Authorized USB devices (U.S. Government clouds)
description: With this capability, you can create groups of USB devices and designate restrictive actions for each group within your DLP policy in Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention. As an example, you will be able to create authorized or unauthorized groups of USB devices based on serial numbers and allow 'copy' of documents to certain groups of USB devices and block 'copy' for others.
